task-wr.title: Unlocking Controller-1
task-wr.shortdesc: You must unlock both controller nodes to provide redundancy.

prereq.p: The network interfaces and storage disks must be configured before controller-1 can be unlocked.
The OAM interface, data interfaces and storage for the compute function must be configured before controller-1 can be unlocked.

result.p: Both controllers are now available, with one active and one redundant.

note.p: Controller-0 and controller-1 use IP multicast messaging for synchronization. If loss of synchronization occurs a few minutes after controller-1 becomes available, ensure that the switches and other devices on the management, infrastructure, and OAM networks are configured with appropriate settings. For example, consider that IGMP snooping may interfere with IP multicast messaging in some scenarios.
